sources.title: How to Keep Cool (1953)
sources.description: Dimwit is an overworked office worker who tries to escape the swelter of the city by driving out to the beach, but he finds nothing but petty problems there. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/how-to-keep-cool-1953/

metadata.Plot: Dimwit is an overworked office worker who tries to escape the swelter of the city by driving out to the beach, but he finds nothing but petty problems there.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
